meaning: offence requiring confession, offence involving expiation

sentence: yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
pali_1: If any monk should sit down hard or lie down hard on a bed or seat with detachable legs on the upper-floor of a hut belonging to the community, there is an offence requiring confession.
